name: lubowa-morph-registration-minifier
description: Minification tools for Lubowa Morph Registration

scripts.minify:js: terser scripts.js --compress --mangle --output scripts.min.js && terser admin.js --compress --mangle --output admin.min.js && terser config.js --compress --mangle --output config.min.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss styles.css --output styles.min.css && cleancss admin-styles.css --output admin-styles.min.css
scripts.build: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
